titleStmt.title: An answer to Nanny O; or, The happy agreement between the two Scotch lovers, Willy & Nanny. Tune of, Nanny O. This may be printed, R.P.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for P. Brooksby at the Golden Ball in Py-corner.,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Verse: "Art thou so loyal to thy love ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
